SEARCH
Package src.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
src.gui.Gui
public class Gui extends Object
Gui class that contains all the methods used to create the GUI of the Dsync application.
Author: Geryes Doumit

    • isDark

      public Boolean isDark(Color c)
      Tells us if a color is dark or not. Used to know what color the text over it should be.
      Parameters:
      c - The color to check.
      Returns:
      True if the color is dark, false otherwise.

    • setPathTextColorWithBG

      public void setPathTextColorWithBG(JLabel label, JTextField path, Color frameBG)
      Sets the text color of a JTextField's and a JLabel's text depending on the background color given.
      Parameters:
      label - : the JLabel to change the color of its text.
      path - : the JTextField to change the color of its text.
      frameBG - : the background color of the frame.

      Returns:

      styledDoc - : the StyledDocument of the JTextPane.
